title: Ramesh Sharma
text: Groww's platform for Futures & Options trading is significantly hampered by several critical issues. The user interface is inadequate for active traders, lacking essential features and resulting in a frustrating trading experience. I strongly advise against using Groww for F&O trading until these shortcomings are addressed. I urge the development team to prioritize improvements to enhance the app's functionality and usability, particularly for F&O users.
author: Ramesh Sharma

title: Pritam Biswas
text: Day by day Groww is increasing brokerage charges and one day Groww will be the top charging broker in India. On 6th August I sold a particular stock in two lots on the same day, Groww deducted the DP charges twice. Although Groww does not charge annual fee, the brokerage rate is much higher than any annual fee charging broker. I am interested in switching to Zerodha or Dhan which will save me from the hassle of app updates.
author: Pritam Biswas
